newlyClosed.name: Tree Fort

morningBrief.headline: TGIF
morningBrief.body: 123 of 123 trails are open with 69 groomed. Mostly Cloudy with a temperatures TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 2" overnight makes the groomers smoother. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow on the Way
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 147 trails open, 63 groomed. Windy with temps around temps TBD. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: A Refresh Is Coming
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 140 trails open, 82 groomed. Mostly Clear with temps around temps TBD. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: More Snow Coming
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 85 trails open, 69 groomed. Partly Cloudy with temps around temps TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. A little something coming our way. Light snow expected to dust things up.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: 177 of 222 trails are open with 90 groomed. Mostly Cloudy with a temperatures TBD. Storm cycle alert! 6" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Is It the Weekend Yet?

morningBrief.headline: Variable Conditions
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 170 trails open, 34 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed with temps around 32. Nearly full mountain access with 170 of 170 trails spinning. The elevation will make all the difference today. Rain down low, snow up high.

morningBrief.headline: 2" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 2" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Heads up: Mansfield Gondola peaked at 17 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.
